definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: And now, we may throw them into the waste recycle.
sentences.chinese: 而现在，我们可以把它们扔进废品回收箱。

sentences.english: Price of waste collection job processing.
sentences.chinese: 价格比收废品的高就处理了。

sentences.english: The results indicate that the reject rate of the tire valve semifinished products are descended.
sentences.chinese: 表明所生产的气门毛坯废品率明显下降。

sentences.english: Police have named Xiong Zhenlin, a local junk collector, as the suspect in the killings.
sentences.chinese: 警方将地方废品收购人熊振林列为杀人嫌疑犯。

sentences.english: A worker pays for a delivery of polystyrene at a recycling center in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 废品收购站里一工人在买聚苯乙烯。

sentences.english: Overprints, High reject rate, Large coldeviation.
sentences.chinese: 多次套印废品率高，色彩偏差大。

sentences.english: Chemical waste is becoming a major public hazard.
sentences.chinese: 化学废品已成为一种主要公害。

sentences.english: Reduction of S&D and continuous improvement.
sentences.chinese: 生产废品率的降低和持续改善。

sentences.english: Most of the victims were his employees.
sentences.chinese: 大部分死者是废品站的雇员。

sentences.english: Pigs fed off food waste, whey and other forms of garden and agricultural waste.
sentences.chinese: 猪是以食品废物，乳清和其他的农业废品为主食的。

sentences.english: But then people left it, and all the garbage and idle equipment remained on its junkyards.
sentences.chinese: 然后人们走了，所有的垃圾和闲置设备留在了废品场。

sentences.english: We started with only a couple of hundred misshapen blobs of clay.
sentences.chinese: 我们开始时只能做出几百个畸形的粘土废品。

sentences.english: Space required for modern biological waste treatment plants is large.
sentences.chinese: 现代生物废品处理站的占地面积很大。

sentences.english: Waste products from factory can be made into roadbuilding material.
sentences.chinese: 工厂的废品可以制成筑路的材料。

sentences.english: Another shocker? A lot of that waste is perfectly functional.
sentences.chinese: 更令人震惊的是很多废品功能良好，其实根本没用过。

sentences.english: The scrappers of Dongxiaokou can only hope the global economy follows suit.
sentences.chinese: 东小口的废品收购者只能盼望全球经济恢复运行。

definition: trash/refuse/garbage/(coll.) of poor quality/Taiwan pr. [le4 se4]
to glean/to collect scraps/to eke out a meager living
remnants of material from an industrial process/offcut/scraps
